Package core

Class Move

java.lang.Object
core.Move
public class Move extends Object
Defines object that describe a movement of a block

    • reverse

      public Move reverse()
      This method reverses the move. The result is very similar to when you multiply a vector by -1
      Returns:
      the newly reversed move

    • evalSteps

      public int evalSteps()
      This method calculates the distance a block travels when this move is applied to it
      Returns:
      the number of cells traveled

    • evalDirection

      public Direction evalDirection()
      This method calculates the direction a block travels when this move is applied to it
      Returns:
      the direction the block moved

    • isCut

      public boolean isCut()
      This method finds if a move cuts a corner or not
      Returns:
      true if this move cuts a corner

    • evalCutMove

      public Move evalCutMove(String state)
      This method calculates the first half of a cut move
      Parameters:
      state - the current board disposition as a String
      Returns:
      the first half of this move
